QuestData.Title: Feral Shadehound
QuestData.Description:
<The runed armor husk pulses with power and seems to struggle for its freedom.
Release your feral shadehound and bind it to you.>
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A Shadehound formed using rune magic discovered on a crumbling stele.
QuestData.LogDescription: Summon and bind your Feral Shadehound.

Objectives.Objective: Summon and bind your Feral Shadehound.
